website_summaries.verdict: Non-acnegenic and silicone free, making it ideal for sensitive or blemished skin.
pros: Vegan ingredients and fragrance free, this offers good coverage and works well on its own
Provides all-day wear even in humidity
Oil-free, yet is also a great moisturizer
cons: It’s a thicker cream, so some found it difficult to blend

customer_reviews.title: I Don’t Wear Foundation Anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Enough coverage to skip makeup, unless you like heavier coverage. I have fair skin, freckles. This doesn’t cover the freckles, but evens out my skin tone & covers lightly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Moisture Surge All Skin Types CC SPF 30 Hydrating Colour Corrector Cream
customer_reviews.text: I like Clinique cosmetics, however, the hydrating colour corrector cream broke out my face after using it three days in a row. I stopped using it for a week and tried using it again. My face reacted the same way. Unfortunately, this did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: wil41do

customer_reviews.title: Long time fan.
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight coverage. I work in an environment where a lot of makeup is not practicle, but I still like to look like I have had some sleep. This stuff is great plus it has sunscreen. I have normal skin. This is natural looking and easy for me to apply. I am not a makeup fanatic. The easier the better. This is easy, light weight, and gives me just enough coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! My new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best I have tried! It was lightweight enough to be comfortable, protects my skin from sum damage, goes on smoothly, great coverage, and blends very well! Perfect for my skin due to dark spots!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dionne Cannon

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Living in the Colorado mountains at close to 8,000 ft above sea level....even the water gets dry! I have tried EVERTHING from $300 med spa moisturizers, to Arbonne, you name it. I kept coming back to Moisture Surge. In fact, it is SO dry in the winter that I have to mix moisture surge with Chanel's CC cream. NOT ANYMORE! This is AMAZING! If you have super dry skin, be sure to continue to moisturize first. Thank you, Clinique!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Matches skin tone
customer_reviews.text: I chose this brand because I like heir other products and it matches my skin tone. It has a bit of moisture; but, I have to add more underneath to get it to go on smoothly. Otherwise, it is a bit dry. The smell is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: It's lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about this, I had bought it cause of the sunscreen. I have to be careful now in the sun. And hate wearing sunscreen under makeup. This was amazing I'm totally in love with it. So lightweight, it gives little color. But feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, what you’d expect from Clinique
customer_reviews.text: It seem a little thicker than I’d like, but otherwise it’s good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very light but good coverage without feeling like you are wearing pancake foundation. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: T Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Glowing performance
customer_reviews.text: Loved this cc cream! I've used acne liquid foundation of Clinique for years, but I loved the way this made my skin glow!
customer_reviews.author: James Wasson

customer_reviews.title: super cream
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle. An amazing alternative to make up. Much more natural looking and protects. Looks great on.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: clinique + Amazon = greatness
customer_reviews.text: Love this . And so glad to find it on Amazon. 1 tube easily lasts me a year
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bonzack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent make up for older skin
customer_reviews.text: All I ever use. Wonderful product. Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Moisture Surge
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. I had not used it before and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby M. Niccum

customer_reviews.title: Heaven in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it states! Goes on creamy and leave a extremely light feeling, it doesn't make my face look "cakey" and covers blemishes amazingly!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. K

customer_reviews.title: Only makeup that stays in place
customer_reviews.text: NEed color correction and this is very easy to apply since it has moisture
customer_reviews.author: Farfal

customer_reviews.title: Go by your color that is best for you.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and no bad smell. I also liked the coverage and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: fay

customer_reviews.title: A very good product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years, it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: tania iwanowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen protection is great, and I like the tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: This it by far my favorite foundation. I like all clinique products
customer_reviews.text: This it by far my favorite foundation. I like all clinique products, but I have very fair skin and have a difficult time finding a match with their other foundation options. I don't like a very heavy or cakey feel on my face, so I really love this product. It give some light coverage and evens out my skin without making me feel like I can't touch my face or let it breathe. If you are looking for a normal coverage and don't want that matte pasty look, this is it! It is very hydrating as well, without being oily.
customer_reviews.author: Cory.Y

customer_reviews.title: Combination Skin Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love his product! I have combination skin and this product works everywhere without making me look or feel caked on. Plus it has an SPF which is always great! I still like to use powder contouring on top of it, so absolutely set with a translucent powder before doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Orth

customer_reviews.title: Love this CC cream!
customer_reviews.text: Love this color corrector cream. Once I discovered it about 2 years ago, I've been wearing it daily every since. I originally was buying this at Macy's at the counter, but so happy I can get it through Prime without having to go to the store and it's the same price. It evens out my skin which is very fair. I also feel like it gives some sun protection since it has SPF15.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leu

customer_reviews.title: Only make I’ll wear
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, not too cakey- also gives a lot of moisture for your skin. My go to foundation
customer_reviews.author: MP15

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable moisture
customer_reviews.text: Love it ..I use this under make up ..however it does not change your skin tone long-term.. But it does even things out before applying foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Fg

customer_reviews.title: Hides imperfections beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. A bit "stiff" to rub in, so I mix it with a moisterizer, then it's smooth as silk and glides on more easily. Just the right amount of color and coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m pretty happy with this, it had great light coverage, and the color is just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey W.

customer_reviews.title: Can really tell a difference in skin
customer_reviews.text: I have Lupus, and use this as an alternative to the medication I usually use. It really helps. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for years because it offers light coverage with a 30 SPF.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily wear
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily for foundation/sunscreen without anything added except clear powder occasionally. Great product and lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: Myra George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cc cream don't need makeup base on top of it
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Coverage and moisturizer were great, however I have a difficult time wearing anything with this high of spf.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a hot humid summer climate and when outside and sweating it got in my eyes and burnt. I changed to the tinted moisturizer with less spf and it works, just wish it had the color correction!
customer_reviews.author: Daneleo

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. If you’re debating, buy it. You’re welcome. I was looking for something light that still gave me coverage. I put this on and then use my beauty blender wet and it’s PERFECT. YOU can also layer it on for better coverage, or use with a powder for a full face look. It’s super versatile. And it doesn’t make me break out. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't match my skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice on my skin, but my skin is way too fair for this "one color fits all" cream. It was way to dark for me, and you could clearly see a line on my jawline where the cc cream ended and my skin began. It also made my face appear oily and shiny. Won't be using again.
customer_reviews.author: LMN11

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: It was good until cold season approached and the heating season started. I had to go back to my old bb cream because this one would reveal all the imperfections of my skin. It seems that whatever was suppose to moisturize was absorbed by my skin in minutes leaving dry patches behind. I will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Egle

customer_reviews.title: Good color correction
customer_reviews.text: I've never been one to wear makeup, but now that I'm in my 30s, I need some evening of my skin tone. This works great for that, without the heavy coverage of foundation. It feels like a moisturizer, but blends out any red blotches (I'm a redhead) and has SPF. Works great for everyday use, but I'd still wear foundation if I had to dress up for anything; it looks just like you have good skin, but not as much coverage as makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

product_meta.title: Clinique Moisture Surge All Skin Types CC SPF 30 Hydrating Colour Corrector Cream, light, 1.4 Ounce
product_meta.description: Clinique Moisture Surge All Skin Types CC SPF 30 Hydrating Colour Corrector Cream, light, 1.4 Ounce
feature_bullets: So it is a healthy-looking glow
With oil-free hydration and sunscreen mean a more flawless look tomorrow, too
This must-have color-correcting formula smooths the complexion and creates an ultranatural radiance
